## IConfig.tracking property

The Jabra SDK can track usage and errors when allowed. See [TrackingOptions](./jabra-js.trackingoptions.md) for available settings.

Defaults to NO\_TRACKING.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tracking?: TrackingOptions;
```
